otm_more.title: About Project
otm_more.a1: International project based on SDG-8, travel, be sustainable, learn marketing and gain volunteering experience in one of the best projects powered by AIESEC.
otm_more.a2: On The Map is an AIESEC brand project that aims to promote sustainable tourism in the Republic of Moldova.
otm_more.a2_2: The project gives participants the chance to travel, learn what sustainable tourism is and gain knowledge in marketing, branding, photography.

otm_contact.title: Contact
otm_contact.ifcontact: If you have any additional questions, don't hesitate to contact us
